translation.en: I have pineapples! I have strawberry!
-I have grapes! I have grapefruit! -[bell ringing]
Hey!
We had a plan, Carter, and you done goofed it.
translation.zh: 我们说好的 卡特 你却搞砸了

translation.en: The plan's still on.
The plan was for you to get me B's.
-Does this look like a freaking B? -I just want what's best for you.
translation.zh: -这长得像B吗？-我只是想帮你争取最好的

translation.en: You know when the last time I got an A was?
translation.zh: 你知道我上次拿A是什么时候吗？

translation.en: Okay, I'll act more stupid next time.
Completely moronic and idiotic. Beyond obtuse.
translation.zh: 我会努力装作又傻又呆 特别迟钝

translation.en: Yeah. Totally.
That's what I'm talking about.
You making fun of me? You're dead this time, Carter.
translation.zh: 你在取笑我？你这次完蛋了 卡特

translation.en: [man] What the...
-[barking] -Hey! You go on now, little mutt.
translation.zh: 嘿！马上走开 小杂种

translation.en: Go on. Go on, dog. I'll turn you into a hot dog. Now, go on.
translation.zh: 走开 小狗不然把你做成热狗 快走

translation.en: [man] I have grapefruit!
I have pineapples! I have strawberries!
Thank you very much.
Have a nice day. Be careful with the cars.
translation.zh: 祝你愉快 小心汽车

translation.en: -You, too. -Okay.
-[Carter] Hey. -[sighs] There you are.
-You're late. Again. -Come on. I wanna go to Sam's.
translation.zh: -你又迟到了-快点 我想去山姆的店

translation.en: I was practicing for my recital.
translation.zh: 我刚刚在为独舞会练习

translation.en: I'm gonna do five pirouettes all on my own.
translation.zh: 我要独自表演五个足尖旋转

translation.en: -It's called a solo. You know that, right? -That's cool, Frankie.
translation.zh: -这叫独舞 你知道的吧？-真棒 弗兰琪

translation.en: [Frankie] And I'm gonna dance in New York, in Swan Lake, and be crazy famous.
translation.zh: 我会去纽约跳舞跳《天鹅湖》 变得非常出名

translation.en: [Carter] But I'll still talk to you.
translation.zh: 不过我还是会和你说话的

translation.en: [Frankie] Why wouldn't you talk to me?
translation.zh: 你怎么会不跟我说话呢？

translation.en: [Carter] Because famous people are always stuck up.
[Frankie] I am not.
And I'm gonna wear my boots to do my pirouettes.
translation.zh: 我会穿上我的靴子做足尖旋转

translation.en: [Carter] Good luck with that.
Hey. You are coming, right?
-To my recital? -Yeah, sure.
If you don't come and Mom has to work, nobody will be there.
translation.zh: 如果你不来妈妈要工作 那就没人来了

translation.en: You'll be great.
I'll be there, Frankie.
I promise.
That is if I invite you.
The tickets are for very important people only.
translation.zh: 门票只能给非常重要的人

translation.en: -Come on, let's get in the street car. -No, we can't!
translation.zh: -来吧 上电车吧-不 我们不能上！

translation.en: -You're the one who wanted to go to Sam's. -Wait, Frankie.
translation.zh: -是你说要去山姆的店的-等等 弗兰琪

translation.en: -I wanna walk. -It'll be fine. Come on.
translation.zh: -我想走着去-没事的 来吧

translation.en: Why do you have strawberries?
What are you talking about?
I saw you have strawberries in your pocket in the car.
translation.zh: 我在车上看到你口袋里有草莓

translation.en: [Carter] I don't have any strawberries.
[Frankie] I saw something red and green.
translation.zh: 我看到红红绿绿的东西了

translation.en: [Carter] I don't have any strawberries in my pocket.
[Frankie] Well, it smeared on the chair and you didn't wipe it up.
translation.zh: 拜托 都糊到椅子上了 你还不擦

translation.en: [Frankie] What do you mean you don't believe me?
translation.zh: （美国最流行的幽灵、吸血鬼之旅） 你说不相信我是什么意思？

translation.en: [Carter] You're gonna fly to Paris to dance? Not gonna happen.
translation.zh: 你要飞去巴黎跳舞？不可能的

translation.en: [Frankie] It will happen. I know it.
translation.zh: 一定能去 我知道的

translation.en: You know you need to punch Pig-Face in the face, right?
translation.zh: 你知道必须要痛扁猪头男的 对吧？

translation.en: -Frankie... I don't care. -He'll bully you your whole life.
translation.zh: -弗兰琪…我不在乎-他会一辈子欺负你的

translation.en: [Carter] I'm not gonna fight back. I'd lose.
translation.zh: 我不会反击的 我一定会输

translation.en: [Frankie] Why are we going here again? It's just a waste of time.
translation.zh: 我们为什么还要来这？真是浪费时间

translation.en: [Carter] Because you never know, it could change sometimes.
translation.zh: 因为谁知道呢 说不定会有转机

translation.en: -Maybe he's in a good mood today. -In your dreams.
translation.zh: -也许他今天心情好-你就做梦吧

translation.en: [Carter] Hi, Mr. King. We're here for the watch.
translation.zh: 嗨 金先生 我们来买表

translation.en: [Carter] $4 and 26, 27, 28 cents.
That brings the total to $34 and 18... No, 19 cents.
translation.zh: 加起来一共是34美元18…不 19美分

translation.en: Not bad, am I right?
-How much more do we have to go? -Oh, you don't even wanna know.
translation.zh: -我们还差多少？-你还是不知道的好

translation.en: -[Frankie sighs] -[Carter] Mr. King,
we've been coming here twice a week for a long time.
translation.zh: 我们每两周来一次 已经坚持很久了

translation.en: You can at least take the watch out of the "For Sale" case.
translation.zh: 你至少可以把手表从“待售”的柜子里拿出来吧

translation.en: Please. He meant to say please.
translation.zh: 拜托 他是想说拜托你拿出来

translation.en: I take it out of the case, people can't see it.
translation.zh: 拿出来人们就看不到了

translation.en: People can't see it, people can't buy it.
translation.zh: 看不到他们就不会买了

translation.en: But we're gonna buy it. Eventually.
translation.zh: 但我们会买啊 总有一天

translation.en: Listen, I told both of you when we started this whole cockamamieness,
translation.zh: 听着 从我们开始这场闹剧那天起我就告诉过你们

translation.en: that if somebody wants the watch, I'll let you know.
translation.zh: 如果有人要买那块表 我会告诉你们

translation.en: -Give you a chance to buy it first. -Yeah, but we should have--
translation.zh: -给你们先买的机会-是的 但是我们应该…

translation.en: [Sam] There's no buts.
When I bought it from your mother, I paid her good money.
translation.zh: 我从你们妈妈那买它时 花了不少钱

translation.en: This is a business. Barely, but it is.
translation.zh: 这是生意 勉强算是 但终归是生意

translation.en: Mr. King, I promise you'll get money. We're at, like, $34 and 19 cents.
translation.zh: 金先生 我保证你会拿到钱的我们已经有了34美元19美分

translation.en: -Baby, you see how old I am? -Old.
translation.zh: -宝贝 你看我有多老了？-很老

translation.en: A hundred?
You're not really helping your case.
The point is, at this rate, you guys will be bringing my money to the cemetery.
translation.zh: 我的意思是 照这个速度你们以后就要把钱送到我的墓地上了

translation.en: I don't like the cemetery.
Listen, a guy came in, he liked the watch. I told him it ran slow.
translation.zh: 听好 有个人来看过 说喜欢那块表我告诉他这表走得慢

translation.en: It doesn't run slow.
My father kept it in perfect condition, and you know that.
translation.zh: 我爸把它保养得可好了 你知道的

translation.en: The point is, pudding head, he's not wearing it, is he?
translation.zh: 小傻瓜 我是说他平常不戴 对吧？

translation.en: Mr. King, of all the people I don't like in this world,
translation.zh: 金先生 在全世界我讨厌的人里

translation.en: I like you the best.
You and every other woman in my life.
translation.zh: 你和我生命里的其他女人都这么说

translation.en: Now, you two, get out of here.
translation.zh: 现在 你们俩都出去吧

translation.en: -We're just gonna keep coming back. -Yeah, like a rash.
translation.zh: -我们会一直回来的-是啊 像牛皮癣一样粘着你

translation.en: -See ya tomorrow. -Take care.
-[Frankie] That was a waste of time. -No, it wasn't. We added more money.
translation.zh: -这就是浪费时间-不是的 我们又加了钱

translation.en: Next time, it'll be less money that we have to add.
translation.zh: 下次需要加的钱就更少了

translation.en: [Frankie] Yeah, yeah, yeah.
You've been giving Mr. King your lunch money. I know you have.
translation.zh: 你是把午饭钱给了金先生 我知道的

translation.en: [Carter] Maybe I wouldn't have to if Mom hadn't sold Dad's watch.
translation.zh: 如果妈妈没卖掉爸爸的手表我可能就不用这么做了

translation.en: Lots of things aren't very good in life. Get used to it.
translation.zh: 人生不如意十有八九 面对现实吧

translation.en: You get used to being grounded forever or longer when Mom finds out.
translation.zh: 你就接着忍受被打倒在地直到被妈妈发现吧

translation.en: [Frankie] I was here first.
[Carter] I'm older, so it doesn't matter. I'm always first.
translation.zh: 我年纪大所以没有先来后到 就该我先

translation.en: Mom doesn't like it when you double dip.
translation.zh: 妈妈不喜欢你把咬过的东西再蘸酱

translation.en: Mom's not here, so if you just shut your mouth for once, you'll be fine.
translation.zh: 妈妈不在 只要你闭嘴不说就没事

translation.en: Fine. I can keep my mouth shut so much that I'll never talk to you
translation.zh: 好吧 我可以一直闭嘴连话都不跟你说

translation.en: for all the time in all the universes in all the world.
translation.zh: 永远不说 到世界尽头都不说

translation.en: [Carter] Thank goodness.
Carter...
Carter can't come to the phone right now.
translation.zh: 卡特现在不方便接听电话

translation.en: Please don't leave a message after the beep. Beep!
translation.zh: 请不要在听到“哔”声后留言 哔！

translation.en: Just look!
If you are satisfied with your message, please press "1" or hang up.
translation.zh: 如果你对收听的信息满意请按“1”或挂断

translation.en: Carter, just listen to me!
What?
No way.
I can't believe it. How did you even get up here?
translation.zh: 不敢相信 你怎么上来的？

translation.en: [Frankie] You know this dog?
[Carter] I was trying to get him to follow us home from school.
translation.zh: 我之前想让他从学校跟着我们回家

translation.en: -I knew you were doing something not good. -Come on. Good boy.
translation.zh: -我就知道你在干坏事-来吧 好孩子

translation.en: Come here. Good boy.
-What's your name, bud? -He's a stray.
translation.zh: -你叫什么 小家伙？-他是流浪狗

translation.en: Where did you come from?
A trash can?
He smells worse than your side of the room.
translation.zh: 他的气味比你那一半房间还难闻

translation.en: You're right. Let's fix it.
translation.zh: 你说得对 我们来帮他

translation.en: [folk song playing] ♪ I love my dog as much as I love you ♪
translation.zh: 我爱我的狗 就像爱你一样

translation.en: ♪ But you may fade My dog will always come through ♪
translation.zh: 你也许会离开但狗狗会永远留在我身旁

translation.en: ♪ All the pay I need Comes shining through his eyes ♪
translation.zh: 他闪耀的眼神让我别无他求

translation.en: ♪ I don't need no cold water To make me realize ♪
translation.zh: 不用让我冷静 我心里非常清楚

translation.en: ♪ That I love my dog As much as I love you ♪
translation.zh: 我爱我的狗 就像爱你一样

translation.en: ♪ But you may fade My dog will always come through ♪
translation.zh: 你也许会离开但狗狗会永远留在我身旁

translation.en: Carter, what are we gonna do about Mom?
translation.zh: 卡特 妈妈那里怎么办？

translation.en: What about her?
She's gonna freak out.
You asked for a bulldog for Christmas, and you got a stuffed animal.
translation.zh: 你圣诞节许愿要斗牛犬结果得到一个毛绒玩具

translation.en: Which is why we're not gonna tell her. He's just gonna stay in our room for now.
translation.zh: 所以我们不能告诉她他现在只能待在我们房间里

translation.en: Where's he gonna pee and poo?
In your bed?
Carter!
Just until I can convince her.
It's Mom. We'll never convince her. Like, ever.
translation.zh: 那是妈妈啊我们永远没法说服她的 绝不可能

translation.en: -Oh, crap. -Oh, no.
Hey, hey!
Where are my two favorite people that help Mom out?
translation.zh: 妈妈最爱的两个小帮手呢？

translation.en: -[Carter] Hey, Mom. -Hi, Mommy!
You're the best mommy of all the mommies in all the world!
translation.zh: 你是全世界最好的妈咪！

translation.en: [Carter] Definitely, you're the best.
translation.zh: 绝对的 你是最棒的

translation.en: What'd you break?
[both] Nothing.
[Whitney] So there were four accidents today. Four!
translation.zh: 今天有四起事故 四起！

translation.en: I was driving the ambulance 80 miles per hour.
translation.zh: 我把救护车开到了时速129公里

translation.en: [Carter] That's a lot, Mom.
[Whitney] Forks on the left, hon.
-Car, is all your homework done? -[Carter] It will be.
translation.zh: -卡特 作业都做完了吗？-会做完的

translation.en: Here you go, Madame. Mushrooms on top.
translation.zh: 给你 女士 上面加了蘑菇

translation.en: How about you, Mr. Man. Anything exciting happen at school today?
translation.zh: 你呢 小小先生今天学校有什么有趣的事吗？

translation.en: Pig-Face happened.
Your death is about to happen.
[Whitney] Again? That's the third time. Okay, that's it. I'm calling the school.
translation.zh: 又来？都第三次了好 够了 我要打电话到学校去

translation.en: Don't blow this up like you blow everything up.
translation.zh: 别小题大做 你总是小题大做

translation.en: I'm not blowing anything up.
I wanna know who this kid is.
translation.zh: 我只想知道这孩子是谁

translation.en: I told you, Pig-Face.
-Can you butt out, Frankie? -Carter, what happened? Tell me the truth.
translation.zh: -你能不插嘴吗 弗兰琪？-卡特 发生了什么？跟我说实话

translation.en: -Carter, just-- -You don't wanna know the truth.
translation.zh: -卡特 你就…-你不会想知道真相的

translation.en: -[Carter whispers] No. -[Whitney] Straight up, Carter.
-Are you scared of this kid? -No.
[Whitney] 'Cause if you are, that's nothing...
translation.zh: 如果你害怕 并没有什么…

translation.en: -Go. -...to be ashamed of.
-[Whitney] Just let me help you. -[chuckles] No. No.
Here you go. No mushrooms.
Um, actually, can I have mushrooms, please?
translation.zh: 其实 我想要点蘑菇 可以吗？

translation.en: -You hate mushrooms. -But taste buds change every seven years.
translation.zh: -你讨厌蘑菇的-味蕾每七年就会改变一次

translation.en: -That's a scientific fact. -He's right. Very, very right.
translation.zh: -这是有科学依据的-他说得对 非常对

translation.en: [Whitney] Mushrooms.
Okay.
I'm just worried about you, Carter.
translation.zh: 我就是担心你 卡特

translation.en: -You're worried about everything. -That is not true.
Okay, maybe that is a little bit true. A little bit.
translation.zh: 好吧 可能是有点儿 就一点儿

translation.en: Anyway, here you go.
What is going on with you guys?
-Nothing. -Nothing.
I feel like you're hiding something from me.
translation.zh: 我感觉你们有事情瞒着我

translation.en: Okay. Mom, let's just calm down and eat our food.
translation.zh: 好了妈妈 我们就冷静下来吃饭吧

translation.en: -[sighs] -Okay, I...
I know that things have been hard,
translation.zh: 我知道咱们日子过得不容易

translation.en: and you guys wake up in the morning and I'm already at work,
translation.zh: 你们早上醒来时 我已经去上班了

translation.en: and you've been on your own a lot lately.
translation.zh: 这段时间你们都是孤零零的

translation.en: But I just want you to know that you can talk to me, you know?
translation.zh: 我就想告诉你们你们有事是可以跟我说的 知道吗？

translation.en: Really, I'm right here. [chuckles]
We do talk to you, Mom.
translation.zh: 我们会跟你说的 妈妈

translation.en: Don't worry.
We love you, Mom, to the moon and back.
translation.zh: 我们爱你 妈妈 月亮代表我的心

translation.en: To the moon and back.
[Carter] This is the Aitken Basin, formed 4.5 billion years ago,
translation.zh: 这是艾托肯盆地 45亿年前形成的

translation.en: which in dog years is a lot.
translation.zh: 对狗狗来说是很久很久以前了

translation.en: My dad showed it to me on an electron telescope
translation.zh: 我爸在他经营的天文馆

translation.en: at the planetarium he ran.
translation.zh: 用电子望远镜指给我看的

translation.en: Wanna know something more interesting?
This is my favorite ballerina book. Isn't she pretty?
translation.zh: 这是我最爱的女芭蕾舞演员的书她是不是很美？

translation.en: -Hey, stop chewing on that. -[whines]
And this is the Nutcracker.
It's about an evil rat king.
translation.zh: 里面有一只邪恶的老鼠王

translation.en: -Die, Rat King, die. -[barks]
translation.zh: 去死吧 老鼠王 受死吧

translation.en: Mom will hear you.
Hey, what if we named him Michael Jordan?
translation.zh: 嘿 不如我们叫他迈克尔乔丹吧？

translation.en: That's the dumbest name for a dog I've ever heard.
translation.zh: 这是我听过最蠢的狗名字

translation.en: Okay. What about Copernicus?
What is going on in your mind? No.
This is my favorite, Sleeping Beauty. There's a lot of kissing.
translation.zh: 这是我的最爱《睡美人》 有很多吻戏

translation.en: [Carter] Look, Benjamin Franklin had a dog.
translation.zh: 看 本杰明富兰克林养过一条狗

translation.en: He thought they were more reliable than people.
That's not very interesting.
Yeah, but what about Benjamin, as his name?
translation.zh: 是 不过本杰明做名字怎么样？

translation.en: Mmm... What about Benji?
He does look kind of like a Benji. He's old and new at the same time.
translation.zh: 他看着是有点本吉的感觉他既老成又新鲜

translation.en: -[Frankie] Yeah. -[whines softly]
Good boy. Good boy.
[Carter] Dad would let us keep Benji.
translation.zh: 爸爸就会让我们养本吉

translation.en: Carter...
I don't wanna say goodbye to Benji.
I don't like goodbye.
Promise me we won't have to.
translation.zh: 跟我保证我们不用这么做

translation.en: Hey, I promise you, Fritter.
translation.zh: 嘿 我保证 小弗

translation.en: [Frankie] I love you, guys.
[Carter] I love you too, Frankie.
[Frankie] And now I lay me down to sleep,
I pray the Lord for this dog to keep.
translation.zh: 我向主祈祷 让这条狗留下

translation.en: And that I will do incredible at my recital.
translation.zh: 希望我能在独舞会上表现出色

translation.en: And that my spelling teacher will quit her job forever and never come back.
translation.zh: 我的拼写老师彻底辞职 永远不回来

translation.en: And that Mommy will not have to worry so much.
translation.zh: 希望妈妈不用那么操心

translation.en: And that I'll never have to eat any more mushrooms as long as I live.
translation.zh: 还有 在我有生之年不用再吃蘑菇

translation.en: Amen.
Good night, Benji.
[Whitney] I don't know what to do, you know?
translation.zh: 我不知道该怎么办 你明白吗？

translation.en: They're getting so big, and they're so smart,
translation.zh: 他们长这么大了 这么聪明

translation.en: and they catch on to things and...
And I'm trying to keep everything together.
It's like I'm nothing but a nag.
translation.zh: 我感觉自己就是个唠叨鬼

translation.en: All of a sudden, I'm so serious.
Every day I feel like I'm messing them up and letting them down.
translation.zh: 我觉得每天都在让他们难堪、失望

translation.en: I don't know how to be in three places at once.
So, feel free to give me some advice
or one of your lame science jokes, or...
translation.zh: 或者给我讲个你的蹩脚科学笑话…

translation.en: a carton of ice cream and bingeing...
translation.zh: 或者给我一盒冰激凌让我大吃特吃…

translation.en: 'cause I could really use it. [sniffles]
[Whitney] Just a quick kiss before I go to work.
translation.zh: 上班前迅速地来个告别吻

translation.en: -Carter? -Good morning, Mom.
What is that?
A stuffed animal. [stammers] An animatronic one.
[sighs] Okay. All right. I'm on to you two.
translation.zh: 好吧 让我逮住你们俩了

translation.en: This is why you guys were being weird last night.
translation.zh: 所以你们昨晚才举止古怪

translation.en: He's cute. Mom, look at him.
translation.zh: 他很可爱 妈妈 看看他

translation.en: [sighs] You know what? I expected Carter to lie to me
translation.zh: 你知道吗？我料到卡特会对我撒谎

translation.en: because he's almost a teenager, but you?
translation.zh: 因为他快到青春期了 你呢？

translation.en: Mom, we're not lying. We just didn't tell you yet.
translation.zh: 妈妈 我们没撒谎我们只是还没告诉你

translation.en: Where did he come from?
Uh, he kind of found me.
On the street, we saved him.
translation.zh: 在街上 我们救了他

translation.en: [Whitney] On the street?
No. Okay.
-[whimpers] -All right, I got it.
You're cute, but you are a dog and you poop everywhere,
translation.zh: 你很可爱 但你是条狗 到处拉屎

translation.en: and you mess everything up, you chew on things,
you keep us up at night.
He loves you, Mommy.
No. Okay? I can barely keep the three of us afloat.
translation.zh: 没有 好嘛？照顾我们三个就已经够我受的了

translation.en: It's not happening.
Mom, you don't have to worry. We'll take care of him.
translation.zh: 妈妈 你不用担心 我们会照顾他

translation.en: I don't have the money or the time.
It's not happening. I'm taking him to a shelter.
translation.zh: 不可能 我要带他去收容所

translation.en: They murder-kill dogs there. You can't take him there.
translation.zh: 那里会把狗杀了的 你不能带他去那

translation.en: -No, they don't. -[Carter] Are you kidding me?
A shelter?
They won't even give him three days.
translation.zh: 他们连三天时间都不会给他

translation.en: I won't let them hurt him.
[Carter] Yeah, you will. You don't care.
He's a good boy, and you won't even give him a chance.
translation.zh: 他是个好孩子 你却根本不给他机会

translation.en: Carter, no, okay?
translation.zh: 卡特 不是这样的 好吗？

translation.en: I'm sorry... I don't...
I can't take care of one more thing right now.
translation.zh: 我现在没有精力再照顾一样东西

translation.en: He's not a thing. He's Benji.
translation.zh: 他不是一样东西 他是本吉

translation.en: You named him?
I'm so sorry that you can't handle one more thing right now,
translation.zh: 你不能再多照顾一样东西 我很遗憾

translation.en: but what about us?
We take care of each other,
so I'm pretty sure that we can handle a dog.
translation.zh: 所以我很确定我们能照顾好一条狗

translation.en: Maybe he'll make things fun around here for once.
translation.zh: 也许他能给这里带来难得的欢乐

translation.en: Oh, I forgot. That's not allowed, either.
translation.zh: 我忘了 这也是不允许的

translation.en: Carter, no... That's not fair.
translation.zh: 卡特 不是的…这样说不公平

translation.en: -Just leave us alone. -[Benji whines]
I don't even like that stupid dog.
translation.zh: 我根本都不喜欢那只笨狗

translation.en: Carter...
Mom won't let you stay.
You'll wind up in a pound.
Just go.
Go, please.
I love you, Benji.
[melancholy song playing] ♪ If your heart believes in dreamin' ♪
translation.zh: 如果你从心底相信梦想

translation.en: ♪ There's no other place I know ♪
translation.zh: 我不知道还有什么别的地方

translation.en: ♪ Well, life here rolls on by Without a care for tomorrow ♪
translation.zh: 生活一天天走过 从不为明天烦忧

translation.en: ♪ Yeah, that was the life for me That was the life for me ♪
♪ How long must I travel On this journey? ♪
♪ Guess I'll count a million stars Along the way ♪
translation.zh: 也许我会在路上数过千百颗繁星

translation.en: ♪ And every time I start to worry ♪
♪ Something whispers in my ear ♪
♪ Says the words I long to hear ♪
♪ Almost home ♪
♪ I'm almost home ♪
♪ Might be lost and afraid ♪
♪ But I'm just a dream away ♪
♪ I'm almost home ♪
♪ Just one more mile And I'll be home free ♪
translation.zh: 再走上一公里 我就能安全到家

translation.en: ♪ Just one more day Is all my heart needs ♪
translation.zh: 再给我一天时间 那是我唯一的渴求

translation.en: ♪ I'm gonna get there ♪
♪ Yeah, I'm gonna get there someday ♪
translation.zh: 是的 总有一天会到达

translation.en: ♪ Feel so cold and alone But I'm... ♪
translation.zh: 与寒冷和孤独作伴 但我…

translation.en: ♪ I'm almost home ♪
-[Frankie] Did you not eat lunch again? -[Carter] I ate lunch.
-Then how come you got more money for Sam? -I don't.
translation.zh: -那你怎么又有钱可以给山姆？-我没有

translation.en: Then how come we're going to Sam's?
translation.zh: 那我们去山姆那儿干什么？

translation.en: To get my money back.
If you get our money back, how do we get Dad's watch back?
translation.zh: 把钱要回来我们还怎么赎回爸爸的手表？

translation.en: Mom doesn't care. She wouldn't let us keep Benji.
translation.zh: 妈妈不在乎 她都不让我们养本吉

translation.en: Why should I care about getting her the watch back?
translation.zh: 我为什么还要费心为她赎回手表？

translation.en: Because we're a family.
[sighs] Whatever.
You're just scared of somebody else buying it.
translation.zh: 你只是怕别人会买走它

translation.en: I'm not scared. I'm realistic, Frankie.
translation.zh: 我没有怕 我这是面对现实 弗兰琪

translation.en: I told you she wouldn't let us keep him.
translation.zh: 我跟你说过她不会让我们养他

translation.en: You're not real or listic or whatever. You're just chicken.
translation.zh: 你既没有面对也没有现实你就是个胆小鬼

translation.en: You give up at everything when not very good things happen.
translation.zh: 只要有不好的事发生你就会放弃一切

translation.en: -Mr. King, we need to talk. -...hold up.
translation.zh: -金先生 我们得谈谈-…举起来

translation.en: Hey, you kids, I sold the watch.
translation.zh: 嘿 小孩 手表我卖掉了

translation.en: You two go on back home now.
-You what? -Sold the watch.
You sold the watch? That's not right.
translation.zh: 你把手表卖掉了？这没有道理

translation.en: -Y'all go on now. Go home. -You know what?
translation.zh: -你们马上离开 回家-你知道吗？

translation.en: I'm gonna call the police and tell them you are a lying liar.
translation.zh: 我要叫警察来告诉他们你是个说谎精

translation.en: You can't sell the watch.
-How y'all doing? -[both gasp]
Now, I remember being a kid.
translation.zh: 我也记得我的童年时光

translation.en: I used to tell my brother there I was gonna beat him with a baseball bat,
translation.zh: 我以前总跟那边那位哥哥讲我会用棒球棒揍他

translation.en: but I didn't really mean it.
When you say you're gonna go get the police,
that's just you being a kid, right?
translation.zh: 也只是在说孩子气的话 对吧？

translation.en: [shudders] Yeah, just talking.
Good, but just in case, y'all are gonna stick around for a while.
translation.zh: 很好 但以防万一你们得在这待一会儿

translation.en: [Sam] Man, you don't need to handle kids like that.
translation.zh: 伙计 你不用这样对待小孩子

translation.en: -[Syd] Shh. -[Carter] Let go.
[Sam] You don't have to do that. Leave 'em alone!
translation.zh: 你不必这样 放开他们！

translation.en: [Syd] Open the safe. Fill the bag. Do it.
translation.zh: 打开保险箱 把包装满 快点

translation.en: -Not until you let them kids go. -Mr. Pawn Man,
translation.zh: -你先把孩子们放了-典当先生

translation.en: put yourself in the shoes of two fellas who would come in here wearing
translation.zh: 你换位思考一下 你想想我们两个

translation.en: these ridiculous masks. Do I look like I'm playing?
translation.zh: 带着滑稽的面具来到这里像是来玩的吗？

translation.en: Open the safe! Hurry up.
Y'all calm down.
-Open up the safe, now! -Don't hurt them kids.
translation.zh: -马上打开保险箱！-别伤害孩子

translation.en: Do it, before I hop that counter
translation.zh: 快点 别等我跳过柜台

translation.en: and slap the taste out your mouth. Come on, hurry up!
Speed it up. Come on!
[Sam] Comin'.
You got what you came for. Now go on.
translation.zh: 你们拿到想要的东西了 马上走吧

translation.en: Tie him up. Let's go.
translation.zh: 把他绑起来 我们走

translation.en: Move. Come on, back door.
-[Sam] Man, wait. -Tie him up.
-Where you taking them kids? -Move! The backdoor. Go. Get out.
translation.zh: -你们要把孩子带去哪里？-快！后门 走 出去

translation.en: Sit down. Sit down. Sit down.
[Carter grunts] Let us go.
Y'all gonna sit here, stay quiet for ten minutes,
translation.zh: 你们坐在这 保持安静十分钟

translation.en: and then forget any of this ever happened.
If you don't, me and my brother will pay a little visit to your home. Understand?
translation.zh: 不然我和哥哥就去你们家找你们 明白吗？

translation.en: -[grunts] Help! -Hurry up.
-[Sam] Over here! -Mr. King!
[Carter] Frankie, stop!
Get up. Get up.
-[Frankie] Help! Help us! -[Carter] Let us go!
-[Syd] Get in the van. -[Frankie] Carter? [screams]
-[Titus] Wait. What are you doing? -They saw my face.
translation.zh: -等等 你在干什么？-他们看到我的脸了

translation.en: -Help! Someone, help us! -[Titus] They kids.
translation.zh: -救命！来人啊 救救我们-他们还是孩子

translation.en: Now they've seen your face, too. Get in the van.
translation.zh: 现在他们也看到你的脸了 上车

translation.en: Please let us go.
-We didn't do anything. -Go on. Get in the van.
translation.zh: -我们什么都没做-快啊 上车

translation.en: Please.
Help! Help!
Frankie.
Damn.
Is that your dog?
-[man] Easy! -[horn blaring]
Get out the way!
-You get this is kidnapping, right? -It's more like saving our butts.
translation.zh: -你知道这是绑架吧？-这是在帮我们善后

translation.en: -[cell phone ringing] -Find the phone, Titus. Hurry up.
translation.zh: 把手机找出来 泰特斯 快

translation.en: -Mommy! -Get rid of it.
-Get it out the window, idiot. -I'm getting it! [grunts]
translation.zh: -扔到窗外去 傻子-在扔呢！

translation.en: [Titus] Please stop.
[Syd] We in too deep now, brother. We can't do that.
translation.zh: 我们已经陷进去了大哥 回不了头了

translation.en: He's gone.
-[Titus] Stop driving! -We can't stop!
-[Titus] We can stop! -No, we can't!
[Titus] Syd, where are you taking us?
translation.zh: 希德 你要带我们去哪儿？

translation.en: [Syd] Don't worry. I got this covered, I promise.
translation.zh: 别担心 我能搞定 我保证

translation.en: Why are you so ugly?
Wanna say that again?
Hey! What are you doing back there?
Nothing. It's just my lunch.
translation.zh: 没什么 这只是我的午饭

translation.en: -[Titus] What is that? -Do not take your eye off of him.
Don't you never call me ugly. Never!
translation.zh: 永远别再说我丑 永远！

translation.en: Hurry up. Hurry up. Hurry up.
Tie 'em up in that back room.
translation.zh: 把他们绑到后面那间房间

translation.en: -[Syd] Hurry up. -[Carter grunts] Let me go!
-Double knots. Put the tarp on the van. -[Titus] They ain't going anywhere.
translation.zh: -打双重结 把油布放到车上去-他们哪也去不了

translation.en: Give me your hands.
Please.
I'm almost done with my shift, and I haven't heard from you guys.
translation.zh: 我就快下班了 还没收到你们的消息

translation.en: I know that you're mad at me, but you have to tell me where you are.
translation.zh: 我知道你们生我的气但你们得告诉我你们在哪儿

translation.en: Look, I'm sorry.
And I love you.
So call me, okay?
What'd you pick this place for? Gives me the creeps.
translation.zh: 你为什么选这里？怪瘆人的

translation.en: So nobody comes sniffing around.
-What're you doing, man? -Checking our score.
translation.zh: -你这是干什么？-查看我们的战利品

translation.en: I mean with them. I didn't sign up for no kidnapping.
translation.zh: 我是说他们 我可没同意参与绑架

translation.en: Let me make something real clear to you.
There are people that want money from us,
but we ain't got no money, do we?
So they gonna break every bone in our body instead.
translation.zh: 所以他们要打断我们的每根骨头

translation.en: That what you signed up for?
I don't owe those people nothing. That's all you.
translation.zh: 我不欠他们任何东西 是你欠他们债

translation.en: Who took care of you seven years, huh?
translation.zh: 是谁照顾了你七年 啊？

translation.en: Food, clothes, all that?
I was the one who figured out a way
for us to keep on even when our own parents wouldn't.
translation.zh: 养活我们俩 连父母都不管我们

translation.en: What I owe, you owe.
translation.zh: 我欠什么 你就欠什么

translation.en: -All right. So what's the plan? -Sell all this, pay off our debt.
translation.zh: -好吧 你怎么打算？-卖掉这些 把债还清

translation.en: Keep them around in case we need a get-out-of-jail-free card.
translation.zh: 以防万一 留着他们做脱身的挡箭牌

translation.en: And then what?
And then we no longer need 'em.
translation.zh: 然后我们就不需要他们了

translation.en: She's cold.
[Syd] So what?
-So what? -I like this here watch.
A lot.
It actually reminds me of a watch my daddy had.
translation.zh: 其实让我想到了我爸的表

translation.en: Give it back!
Was this the reason y'all was in the shop today?
translation.zh: 这是你们今天去那家店的原因吗？

translation.en: "To the man of my dreams.
I love you more than the moon and the stars.
translation.zh: 我爱你们 月亮与星辰代表我的心

translation.en: Love, W." That's nice.
Let me work this here.
Your daddy run off. Got sick and tired of you, your old mama.
translation.zh: 你们的爸爸跑了厌倦了你们和你们衰老的妈妈

translation.en: So she sold it. It's good riddance.
translation.zh: 所以她把它卖了 是一种解脱

translation.en: But then, y'all want a little something something to remember him by.
translation.zh: 但是 你们想要一样小小的东西用来纪念他

translation.en: Ain't that right, little man?
Tell me how bad you want it.
Come on. Tell me.
It's yours, ain't it?
You can take it from me.
Take it. Take it.
Yeah.
What you scared of?
You're a little coward, huh?
translation.zh: 你就是个小懦夫 对吧？

translation.en: Just like your old man.
Sic, Rott! Sic him!
-[Titus] We okay? -You, too, dumbo.
translation.zh: -我们没事吧？-你也去 笨蛋

translation.en: Go. Go!
Hey!
Dumb move, dog.
translation.zh: 进去你就傻了 小狗

translation.en: Where are you?
-[barks] -Hey!
Hey!
Help!
Day keeps getting better.
Little doggie.
Where you at, baby boy?
translation.zh: 你在哪儿啊 小家伙？

translation.en: Come out and play.
Little doggie.
Where are you?
I'm gonna skin you alive.
Gonna wipe that stupid grin off your face.
Where you at?
Benji!
Come here, boy. Get this. Please, get this.
translation.zh: 快来 孩子 咬这个 拜托 咬断它

translation.en: Good boy.
I hate that dog!
-[Carter] Please, Benji, hurry. -It's stuck. He can't get it.
translation.zh: -拜托 本吉 动作快-卡住了 他咬不开

translation.en: -[Carter] Please, Benji. -Come on!
-[gasps] -Where is he?
[Syd] Oh, I think Rottie smells him.
-Where could he be? -[both gasp]
-Get him, Rott. -[Carter] No!
Run, Benji, run!
translation.zh: 快跑 本吉 快跑！

translation.en: -[growling] -[Carter] Don't hurt him!
Run, Benji!
[Sam] Help! Get me out of here.
Hey, who is that?
-[panting] -Is that a dog?
What are you doing in here?
Puppy, bark for me!
Where'd you go, puppy? Come on, puppy.
translation.zh: 你去哪了 狗狗？来啊 狗狗

translation.en: Where'd you go? I know you're out there.
translation.zh: 你去哪了？我知道你在外面

translation.en: What are you doing out there?
Come on, puppy. Come on, puppy. Come on.
translation.zh: 来啊 狗狗 快来

translation.en: Hey, puppy, come on back now.
translation.zh: 嘿 狗狗 快回来

translation.en: What're you...
Are you trying to get the lock?
Come on, puppy, you can do it! I know you can.
translation.zh: 加油 狗狗 你可以的！我知道你可以的

translation.en: Come on, pup. Don't leave me now. Don't give up, puppy.
translation.zh: 加油 小狗 别丢下我别放弃 狗狗

translation.en: Come on, baby. I know you can do it. Come on, puppy. You almost got it. Get it.
translation.zh: 加油 宝贝 我知道你能行的加油 狗狗 还差一点 来吧

translation.en: Come on, pup. Come on, I know you can do it.
translation.zh: 加油 小狗 快 我知道你能行

translation.en: Puppy, thank you! You opened the door!
translation.zh: 狗狗 谢谢你！你把门打开了！

translation.en: Yes, yes, hey. Good boy.
Wait. Where's Carter and Frankie?
translation.zh: 等等 卡特和弗兰琪呢？

translation.en: [Lyle] Yes, sir. I'll keep you posted. Yeah.
translation.zh: 是 长官 我会及时向你汇报 是

translation.en: Sam King? Sam King?
Detective Lyle Burton. How you doing?
translation.zh: 我是莱尔波顿警探 你好吗？

translation.en: -Hey. Listen. You got to find the kids. -Trust me, we're gonna find them.
translation.zh: -嘿 听着 你得找到孩子们-相信我 我们会找到他们的

translation.en: Did you see what the guys look like?
translation.zh: 你看到他们的长相了吗？

translation.en: -No, they were wearing-- -I got something.
translation.zh: -没有 他们带着面具…-我找到个东西

translation.en: Okay. Hold on for a second, okay? What you got? What you got?
translation.zh: 好 稍等一下可以吗？你找到什么？

translation.en: I found it out back.
-Sam! Where's Frankie and Carter? -[Sam] Lord, Ms. Hughes, I'm so sorry.
translation.zh: -山姆！弗兰琪和卡特呢？-上帝 休斯女士 我很抱歉

translation.en: -What happened? -Ms. Hughes, I'm Detective Lyle Burton.
translation.zh: -怎么回事？-休斯女士 我是莱尔波顿警探

translation.en: -We're gonna do everything we can-- -Why were they even here?
translation.zh: -我们会想尽一切办法…-他们怎么会来这里？

translation.en: -It's the watch. -The watch?
Your husband's watch.
The kids have been coming in every day almost trying to buy it back.
translation.zh: 孩子们几乎每天都来 想把它赎回去

translation.en: I told them that I sold it. I didn't know that they'd come in here to...
translation.zh: 我跟他们说我卖掉了我不知道他们会来这里…

translation.en: -Hey! What... -Get him. What...
-What is he doing here? -That dog saved me.
translation.zh: -他在这干什么？-这条狗救了我

translation.en: -Is he yours? -No. What... He what?
translation.zh: -是你的狗吗？-不是 什么…他做了什么？

translation.en: He got me out of the dang closet they locked me in.
translation.zh: 我被锁在储藏室里 他把我救了出来

translation.en: [Lyle] We need to follow procedure, okay?
translation.zh: 我们要按规定来 好吗？

translation.en: [Sam] I think he's trying to tell you something.
translation.zh: 我觉得他想告诉你些什么

translation.en: Ms. Hughes! Ms. Hughes!
Stay put. Requesting backup. I got a 2-12 on foot.
translation.zh: 原地待命 请求支援 我在追击疑犯

translation.en: [woman on radio] Suspect identification?
Uh, brown hair, 35 pounds, four legs.
translation.zh: 棕色毛发 16公斤 四条腿

translation.en: You wanna repeat that, Burton?
Not especially.
[woman] We're parked down there.
[Lyle] Ms. Hughes, let me do my job.
translation.zh: 休斯女士 交给我来处理

translation.en: I'm following that dog.
[Lyle] Listen, we'll find them.
translation.zh: 听着 我们会找到他们的

translation.en: -We will follow the dog. Just come on. -Fine. Let's go.
translation.zh: -我们跟着这条狗 上车-好吧 我们走

translation.en: -Hey, hold up, hold up. -[Whitney] Sam?
About to catch a heart attack.
Get in the car. Let's go!
Hey, hey. No, no, no, you wait. Wait here. I got it.
translation.zh: 嘿 不 你等等 在这等着 我来

translation.en: Must be out of my doggoned mind.
The heck you sniffing around for?
What you got?
What? What is that?
Pudding? Does it look like I want pudding?
translation.zh: 布丁？你看我像想吃布丁的样子吗？

translation.en: -[barks] -What will I do with that?
Is that why you brought us here?
translation.zh: 你带我们来就是为这个？

translation.en: Okay. [sighs]
And then you walk off. Great.
translation.zh: 然后你走开了 好极了

translation.en: Stop. Just stop.
No, stop. Just stop!
translation.zh: 不 停下 别这样！

translation.en: Do you have any idea how much time I've wasted?
translation.zh: 你知道我浪费了多少时间吗？

translation.en: My kids are... [sighs]
I don't wanna see you ever again. Go.
translation.zh: 我再也不想见到你了 你走吧

translation.en: Do you hear me? Go!
What the heck were you thinking, Street? We got procedure, son.
translation.zh: 你到底在想什么 警探？我们是有规定的 孩子

translation.en: Sir, I know. I got carried away.
translation.zh: 长官 我知道 我被带偏了

translation.en: Ms. Hughes? Here's a cup of jasmine tea. It manifests good fortune.
translation.zh: 休斯女士？来杯茉莉花茶吧 能预示好运

translation.en: -Thank you. -You're welcome.
How much money had they saved up?
It doesn't matter. I should've given them the watch back.
translation.zh: 这不重要 我应该把表还给他们的

translation.en: No, I never should have sold it.
translation.zh: 不 我就不该卖掉它

translation.en: I should've done something
so they didn't think that buying a watch would make it all okay.
translation.zh: 这样他们就不会觉得买回手表就能解决一切

translation.en: The honest truth is, Ms. Hughes...
I didn't give the watch back, 'cause I like having 'em come in.
translation.zh: 我没把表还给他们是因为我喜欢他们到我这来

translation.en: Those two, they got nothing but love in 'em.
translation.zh: 那两个孩子心里只装着爱

translation.en: -I got something. -It's Carter's.
A traffic cop found it.
No usable prints, but it's a starting point, location-wise.
translation.zh: 没有有用的指纹但这是个开端 能帮助锁定位置

translation.en: Hey, come on. Give me my phone back.
translation.zh: 嘿 拜托 把手机还给我

translation.en: Don't eat the rubber ducky. Give me that back. Good boy. Good boy.
translation.zh: 别吃橡皮鸭 还给我 好孩子

translation.en: -Who's a good boy? -[Frankie] What's his name, anyways?
translation.zh: -谁是好孩子？-对了 他叫什么？

translation.en: [Carter] I don't think he has one. He's a stray.
translation.zh: 我觉得他没有名字 他是流浪狗

translation.en: Hey, where did you come from, buddy? Do you need a home?
translation.zh: 嘿 你从哪来的 伙计？你想有个家吗？

translation.en: [Frankie] What are you thinking? What if Mom finds out?
translation.zh: 你在想什么？妈妈发现了怎么办？

translation.en: [Carter] I'm thinking he's lonely.
[Carter] What are we gonna name him?
[Frankie] Like there's even a reason to name him. Mom will never let us keep him.
translation.zh: 说的好像起名字有用似的妈妈不会让我们养的

translation.en: [Carter] It's kind of like...
when Dad got sick, Mom did, too.
translation.zh: 爸爸得病的时候 妈妈也病了

translation.en: [Frankie] I miss Dad, but I miss Mom even more.
translation.zh: 我想爸爸 但我更想妈妈

translation.en: [Carter] I know, Fritter. I know.
translation.zh: 我知道 小弗 我知道

translation.en: [somber song playing] ♪ When the road gets dark ♪
♪ And you can no longer see ♪
♪ Just let my love throw a spark ♪
♪ And have a little faith in me ♪
♪ When the tears you cry ♪
♪ Are all you can believe ♪
♪ Just give these lovin' arms a try Baby ♪
translation.zh: 给爱的臂膀一个机会吧 宝贝

translation.en: ♪ And have a little faith in me ♪
♪ And have a little faith in me ♪
♪ And have a little faith in me ♪
♪ And have a little faith in me ♪
♪ And have a little faith in me ♪
♪ And when your back's against the wall ♪
[man] Hey, dog!
♪ Just turn around and you will see ♪
translation.zh: 转过身来 你就会看到

translation.en: ♪ I will catch you I will catch your fall, baby ♪
translation.zh: 我会抓住你 抓住坠落的你 宝贝

translation.en: ♪ Just have a little faith in me ♪
♪ And have a little faith in me ♪
♪ And have a little faith in me ♪
♪ And have a little faith in me ♪
[Syd] Come on, what'd I tell you? Hear me, boy?
translation.zh: 快点 我说什么来着？听见没 小子？

translation.en: -We'll get out of here. -I don't wanna go anymore.
Look at my face. See how much I care?
translation.zh: 看着我 看到我不在乎的表情了吗？

translation.en: Go on. Come on, Titus. Let's go.
translation.zh: 继续走 跟上 泰特斯 我们走

translation.en: Uh... What are we doing, man?
translation.zh: 我们要怎么做 兄弟？

translation.en: Listen. I know a guy, all right?
translation.zh: 听着 我认识个人 好吧？

translation.en: He's gonna buy our score and take us up river.
translation.zh: 他会买我们的战利品带我们从水路离开

translation.en: [Titus] I mean, with them.
They're coming with us. Come on.
translation.zh: 他们跟我们一起 快

translation.en: What are you saying?
Don't worry your pretty little head about it.
translation.zh: 别费你的小脑袋瓜去想了

translation.en: What y'all doing over there?
-Nothing. -Nothing.
Nothing.
-Ain't we clever? -[barking]
No, please. No.
translation.zh: 不要 求求你 不

translation.en: -No, please, please. -Please. Please.
Let me be real clear...
I don't need but one of y'all to be my insurance policy. You hear me?
translation.zh: 我只需要你们当中的一个人做保险单 听到没？

translation.en: Get goin'. Go on.
Titus!
-Ms. Hughes... -I have to go find my kids.
translation.zh: -休斯女士…-我要去找我的孩子

translation.en: -Just give me a second. -I can't just sit here any longer.
translation.zh: -给我点时间-我不能再坐着等了

translation.en: -I have to go. -You have to be rational.
Ms. Hughes! I have a lead.
What?
This van. It was stolen two days ago.
-And you think that they're in there? -Yeah.
It raced out of the quarter down towards the river.
translation.zh: 它冲出城区 驶向河边

translation.en: That's right where the dog was taking us.
translation.zh: 那就是小狗带我们去的地方

translation.en: -It's just a coincidence. -How is that a coincidence?
translation.zh: -只是个巧合-怎么可能是巧合？

translation.en: -Listen, the house was empty. -Maybe you didn't look hard enough.
translation.zh: -听着 房子是空的-也许你找得不够仔细

translation.en: You're talking as if you think a dog is smarter than the police.
translation.zh: 你说得好像狗比警察聪明一样

translation.en: I'm going back to the house.
We need to follow protocol this time!
translation.zh: 我们这次要按规程办事！

translation.en: Detective...
I don't think that dog was following any kind of protocol.
translation.zh: 我觉得那条狗没有遵循任何规程

translation.en: I think he was following his heart.
If anybody ask, I'm following the lead, all right?
translation.zh: 要是有人问就说我去追踪线索了 好吗？

translation.en: Don't you worry. I'm real good at not telling the police things.
translation.zh: 别担心 我很擅长不向警察透露信息

translation.en: [Lyle] Ms. Hughes!
Boat's coming in, Syd.
[Syd] I'm on lookout. Flag him down. He's got the cash for the loot.
translation.zh: 我看着呢 招呼他停下他带了买战利品的现金

translation.en: There's our ride.
Stay.
Carter, I always pretend like I'm not scared,
translation.zh: 卡特 我总是假装自己不害怕

translation.en: but I'm really scared.
I'm really scared.
Please, God.
Please help us get back home.
Please, please, please.
Please.
This wasn't open before.
Are you sure?
I'm sure.
[Lyle] Oh, you got to be kidding me.
-[Whitney] What? What is that? -Hey, relax.
translation.zh: -怎么了？那是什么？-嘿 别紧张

translation.en: It's an underground transport tunnel,
built way back for things you don't even wanna know about.
translation.zh: 很久之前建造的用途是你根本不想知道的

translation.en: -You think they went... Carter! Frankie! -What you doing?
translation.zh: -你觉得他们…卡特！弗兰琪！-你干什么？

translation.en: -Those are my kids! -Relax. Listen. We can cut 'em off.
translation.zh: -他们是我的孩子！-放松 听着 我们可以拦截他们

translation.en: -There's a river. I'll make a call. Okay? -Okay.
translation.zh: -有条河 我来打电话安排 好吗？-好

translation.en: -Wait! Give me your keys. -Huh?
-I drive an ambulance for a living. -No.
No!
You call this driving?
Not yet.
[Carter] Benji! Help!
[Frankie] Help us!
[Carter] Help us, Benji! Help!
translation.zh: 救救我们 本吉！救命！

translation.en: [man] Here's your money. We leave in five.
translation.zh: 给你钱 我们五分钟后出发

translation.en: You're not your brother.
My brother thinks I'm stupid.
He thinks he's the boss of me.
-But I can make decisions for myself. -Yeah.
That's why I'm taking this here cash...
translation.zh: 所以我要带上这些现金…

translation.en: all for me...
and bailin'...
so I don't never have to listen to another thing he says...
translation.zh: 我就再也不用听他的了…

translation.en: never again.
Who's ugly now?
Hey, my man! Can you help us out? Have you seen these two kids?
translation.zh: 嘿 伙计！能帮个忙吗？你见过这两个孩子吗？

translation.en: A van? Anything out of the ordinary?
translation.zh: 面包车呢？有没有什么反常的事？

translation.en: No, sir, I never seen 'em.
translation.zh: 没有 先生 我没见过他们

translation.en: [Frankie faintly] Help! Help!
Benji.
-That her dog? -Yeah. Whether she knows it or not.
translation.zh: -那是她的狗？-是 不管她有没有意识到

translation.en: Okay, I'm requesting backup. I'm at the boatyard, right off...
translation.zh: 好了 我要请求支援我在船厂 位于…

translation.en: Hey!
-[growling] -It's a little late, you idiot.
Come on, I thought we was friends.
translation.zh: 拜托 我以为我们是朋友

translation.en: -Gotcha, slick. -[grunts]
You got the right to pretty much nothing.
translation.zh: 你有权做的事几乎没有

translation.en: Benji!
[man] Cut the rope, idiot!
[pants] Don't you ever quit?
-[whimpers] -Benji!
You thought that dog was gonna save you?
You're not going anywhere.
-Yeah, we are. -What are you gonna do, big man?
translation.zh: -是啊-你能做什么 大小伙？

translation.en: About time.
-Frankie, Carter! -Mommy!
Benji.
Benji! Benji!
I love you, Benji.
Benji?
-Benji? Ben? -[whimpers]
Benji?
He didn't give up.
-Good boy. Good boy. -[Whitney] Benji.
-I love you. -I don’t have to say goodbye.
-[Whitney] Thank God. -Thank you.
-Hi! -[all laughing]
[Syd] Get your hands off me.
[Lyle] Whoa, whoa, whoa. I got him. I got him.
Thank you.
This is going back where it belongs.
Watch your head.
Hello.
Did good today. Good boy.
translation.zh: 今天做得不错 好小子

translation.en: What you doing?
[chuckles] Oh, I had no idea.
You're a good girl. You're a very good girl.
translation.zh: 你是个好姑娘 干得漂亮

translation.en: [mouthing] Thank you.
[Carter] Good boy.
-[Frankie] I'm so glad you're back. -[Carter] We're keeping him, right?
translation.zh: -真高兴你回来了-我们会养他的 对吧？

translation.en: -[Whitney sighs] I don't know. -Mom!
[Whitney] We're definitely keeping him.
[Frankie] We're gonna bake cookies and play dress up and you can help me with ballet.
translation.zh: 我们要一起烤饼干梳妆打扮 你还能帮我跳芭蕾

translation.en: [Carter] Stop. You're scaring him.
translation.zh: 别说了 你吓到他了

translation.en: [upbeat song playing] ♪ I feel love ♪
♪ All around ♪
♪ I can feel it ♪
♪ Shinin' down ♪
♪ It lights up the day Like the mornin' sun ♪
translation.zh: 如同晨光 点亮一天

translation.en: ♪ Reachin' out and touchin' everyone ♪
♪ I feel love ♪
♪ All day long ♪
♪ Like a promise ♪
♪ Like a song ♪
♪ And it's feelin' good ♪
♪ Like I knew it would ♪
♪ Everywhere I go ♪
♪ I feel love ♪
[gentle song playing] ♪ If your heart believes in dreamin' ♪
translation.zh: 如果你从心底相信梦想

translation.en: ♪ There's no other place I know ♪
translation.zh: 我不知道还有什么别的地方

translation.en: ♪ Well, life here rolls on by Without a care for tomorrow ♪
translation.zh: 生活一天天走过 从不为明天烦忧

translation.en: ♪ Yeah, that was the life for me That was the life for me ♪
♪ How long must I travel On this journey? ♪
♪ Guess I'll count a million stars Along the way ♪
translation.zh: 也许我会在路上数过千百颗繁星

translation.en: ♪ And every time I start to worry ♪
♪ Something whispers in my ear ♪
♪ Says the words I long to hear ♪
♪ Almost home I'm almost home ♪
translation.zh: 快到家了 我就快到家了

translation.en: ♪ Might be lost and afraid But I'm just a dream away ♪
translation.zh: 也许曾迷失、恐惧但只需再做一个美梦

translation.en: ♪ I'm almost home I'm almost home ♪
♪ Feel so cold and alone ♪
♪ But I'm almost home ♪
♪ Just one more mile And I'll be home free ♪
translation.zh: 再走上一公里 我就能安全到家

translation.en: ♪ Just one more day Is all my heart needs ♪
translation.zh: 再给我一天时间 那是我唯一的渴求

translation.en: ♪ I'm gonna get there ♪
♪ Yeah, I'm gonna get there someday ♪
translation.zh: 是的 总有一天会到达

translation.en: ♪ I'm almost home ♪
♪ On my own ♪
♪ Might be lost and afraid But I'll get there someday ♪
translation.zh: 也许曾迷失、恐惧但我总有一天会到达

translation.en: ♪ I'm almost home Almost home ♪
translation.zh: 我就快到家了 就快到家了

translation.en: ♪ Feel so cold and alone But I'm... ♪
translation.zh: 与寒冷和孤独作伴 但我…

translation.en: ♪ I'm almost home ♪
♪ I'm almost home ♪
[man] Action.
[man] Cut it.
